# isHandlingWriting

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the user is actively writing in a text view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isHandlingWriting: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

This property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] in between calls to [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIScribbleInteractionDelegate/scribbleInteractionWillBeginWriting(_:)] and [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIScribbleInteractionDelegate/scribbleInteractionDidFinishWriting(_:)] when the user is writing.
title: isHandlingWriting
